title: Literally everything has now become the support's job
body:
Turns out, no one wants to do anything anymore except bathe in the accolades of victory. I get entire teams full of ADCs and assassins who can't and won't do the literal one and only thing they will ever focus on, and the few that do attempt to can't even do that. 

No one pushes.

No one defends.

No one goes for objectives.

No one plays the tank.

No one has range.

No one has magic damage.

No one has crowd control.

No one has armor piercing.

No one has Grevious Wounds.

No one has Magic Penetration.

No one is the support.

No one wards.

No one ward sweeps.

No one watches the minimap.

No one scouts.

And as it turns out, no one wants to actually deal damage, either. They just want the kills. Every fucking game I've been in since the pre-season, all the assassin mains do the least amount of damage out of everyone on the team, and since the entire team is composed of nothing but assassins, NO ONE DEALS DAMAGE. They expect the support to do it all; every last goddamn thing I listed, AND MORE. And then they have the balls to come on the forums and complain about how imbalanced the game is. YOU ALL ARE THE IMBALANCED ONES.

To make matters worse, people have abandoned reading anything in the changelogs, and are forgetting what any and all champions do. It's like Alzheimer's has affected the entire community.

See, I disagree with that notion (with me being someone who regularly plays "off-meta" supports like ekko/lb/maokai). If your support builds a sightstone/helps the team get ahead, does it really matter who they're playing? While I do get that there are some people who will take the support role just to troll around with things like zed/yasuo, that doesn't make all non-standard support players evil.

If you want to build pure AP, its best to just chose a Support character then. If you want to go with a non-specified-Support champion then you get mostly support items. I like going Taric, Bard, and Nunu support. Nunu because of his constant MS + AS boosts and his MS + AS reductions. I finally found my counter to Jinx. :D

No. One of the more devious types of players are the ones who enter the queue with "fill" to pirate a role from someone else or hold the game hostage to ransom a role they want. I'm hoping Riot creates an effective way to punish these players; I encountered three of them during my placement games alone.

Mage supports are what I call artillery supports. They're dedicated to dealing ranged damage and relentlessly poking the enemy, focusing on volume over damage. Brand is a really good one, since most everyone wants to endlessly teamfight like rabid dogs these days, and Brand severely punishes the enemy for bunching up (which they do because no one has actual range and can only focus one enemy at a time). And the best thing about a Brand support is even a glancing blow with an attack burns a full stack of Tribute, AND deals percent damage. It does not take much for him to start snowballing even as the support.

OMG I thought this only happened to me in Ranked. Cannot remember the last time I had a good experience with Lux support. And half the time I find my AP Support who is really a poor-man's mid doesn't even have a SS, making me wish I had bought the green smite.

Honestly? Brand support is the way to go in ranked.

Brand can push waves, has magic damage, can get Morellos for grevious wounds, can defend and hold turret on his own, builds magic penetration and % health true damage to bust the enemy tanks.

If you look at the OPs post, Brand basically does everything your stupid team will not do.

Brand also has no sustain, only one CC that requires setup and a clear line of sight for a skillshot, and can't tank for beans.

He can do OK as a support but only if your team comp permits, like if you have a tank/juggernaut toplane or jungle and your team has enough CC already. Taking brand support into a team of ADCs and assassins is just making things worse.

Any champion can build those. Brand has no inherent DR, no defense scalings, no defensive abilities, no self-sustain or shields... BRAND cannot tank for beans.
